bug.author: felipheggaliza
bug.summary: Error Compiling OpenPose - std::accumulate not found
bug.description:
CXX src/openpose/core/array.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/nmsCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/resizeAndMergeCaffe.cpp src/openpose/core/array.cpp: In member function ‚Äòvoid op::Array::reset(const std::vector&)‚Äô: src/openpose/core/array.cpp:166:28: error: ‚Äòaccumulate‚Äô is not a member of ‚Äòstd‚Äô mVolume = {std::accumulate(sizes.begin(), sizes.end(), 1ul, std::multiplies<size_t>())}; ^ compilation terminated due to -Wfatal-errors. Makefile:471: recipe for target '.build_release/src/openpose/core/array.o' failed make: *** [.build_release/src/openpose/core/array.o] Error 1 make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs.... <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Errors detected. Exiting script. The software might have not been successfully installed. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Errors detected. Exiting script. The software might have not been successfully installed. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>

comments.comment: If you add at the top of <denchmark-link:../tree/master/src/openpose/core/array.cpp>src/openpose/core/array.cpp</denchmark-link> , does it compile? (If so, I will add it to the file for new users). Thanks!

It seems the bug on array.cpp was fixed by adding #include to the beginning of the file, but I also had to do the same solutions for src/openpose/core/netCaffe.cpp Now I am getting new error: ------------------------- Compiling OpenPose ------------------------- CXX src/openpose/pose/poseExtractorCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/experimental/hand/handExtractor.cpp CXX src/openpose/experimental/hand/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/experimental/face/faceExtractor.cpp CXX src/openpose/experimental/face/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/wrapper/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/nmsCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/resizeAndMergeCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/netCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/keyPointScaler.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/cvMatToOpOutput.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/renderer.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/scaleKeyPoints.cpp CXX src/openpose/core/cvMatToOpInput.cpp NVCC src/openpose/pose/poseRenderGpu.cu NVCC src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorBase.cu NVCC src/openpose/experimental/hand/handRenderGpu.cu NVCC src/openpose/experimental/face/faceRenderGpu.cu NVCC src/openpose/core/resizeAndMergeBase.cu NVCC src/openpose/core/nmsBase.cu CXX examples/openpose/rtpose.cpp ^Cnvcc error : 'g++' died due to signal 2 Makefile:471: recipe for target '.build_release/examples/openpose/rtpose.o' failed make: *** [.build_release/examples/openpose/rtpose.o] Interrupt Makefile:477: recipe for target '.build_release/cuda/src/openpose/core/nmsBase.o' failed make: *** [.build_release/cuda/src/openpose/core/nmsBase.o] Error 2 Makefile:477: recipe for target '.build_release/cuda/src/openpose/pose/poseRenderGpu.o' failed make: *** [.build_release/cuda/src/openpose/pose/poseRenderGpu.o] Interrupt Makefile:477: recipe for target '.build_release/cuda/src/openpose/core/resizeAndMergeBase.o' failed make: *** [.build_release/cuda/src/openpose/core/resizeAndMergeBase.o] Interrupt

That ^Cnvcc error : 'g++' died due to signal 2 line, ^C happens when the user manually stops the compilation (I am not aware of ^C being used on non-user activities). Can you perform make clean in both the OpenPose and 3rdparty/caffe/ folders and try again? Thanks!

Now everything compiled successfully! Thank you very much! ------------------------- OpenPose Installed ------------------------- ------------------------- Caffe and OpenPose Installed -------------------------
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/yeechongyeung>@yeechongyeung</denchmark-link> message completely unrelated with the error this issue discuss. I deleted it. Please, post it in a new issue thread.

Hi folks, I am getting some sort of similar error, but not exactly the same. CXX src/openpose/producer/videoReader.cpp CXX src/openpose/producer/producer.cpp CXX src/openpose/producer/imageDirectoryReader.cpp CXX src/openpose/producer/videoCaptureReader.cpp CXX src/openpose/producer/ipCameraReader.cpp CXX src/openpose/producer/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/producer/webcamReader.cpp CXX src/openpose/gui/frameDisplayer.cpp CXX src/openpose/gui/guiInfoAdder.cpp CXX src/openpose/gui/gui.cpp CXX src/openpose/gui/defineTemplates.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseRenderer.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/renderPose.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseExtractor.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseParameters.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseExtractorCaffe.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseCpuRenderer.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseGpuRenderer.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/poseParametersRender.cpp CXX src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorBase.cpp In file included from ./include/openpose/utilities/errorAndLog.hpp:9:0, from ./include/openpose/core/common.hpp:13, from ./include/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorBase.hpp:4, from src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.cpp:4: src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.cpp: In member function ‚Äòvirtual void op::BodyPartConnectorCaffe::Forward_gpu(const std::vector<caffe::Blob*>&, op::Array&, op::Array&)‚Äô: src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.cpp:178:24: error: ‚Äòtop‚Äô was not declared in this scope UNUSED(top); ^ ./include/openpose/core/macros.hpp:23:39: note: in definition of macro ‚ÄòUNUSED‚Äô #define UNUSED(unusedVariable) (void)(unusedVariable) ^ compilation terminated due to -Wfatal-errors. Makefile:478: recipe for target '.build_release/src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.o' failed make: *** [.build_release/src/openpose/pose/bodyPartConnectorCaffe.o] Error 1 make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs.... src/openpose/pose/poseGpuRenderer.cpp:65:73: warning: unused parameter ‚ÄòscaleInputToOutput‚Äô [-Wunused-parameter] const float scaleInputToOutput,
Please use the default installation steps, that could only happen if you are omitting something or trying to change a non-editable parameter
Thank you! I missed 1 step. Everything is working fine üëç
